name: FollowBot
description:
💗🤖FollowBot 💗🤖

💗💗💗💗💗

You are in charge of counting the followers of an influencer.     👨‍💻🤖👨‍💻

You will have to count all the followers without missing a single one.

🌞- Features -🌞
  • Get to have a major Influencer.😍
  • A global leaderboard, where you can see if you have the most famous Influencer.🥇🏆
  • Always have followers with different looks.
  • Easy to play, you only need 2 buttons.
  • 2d and colorful.🌈
  • Achievements 🏆
  • It's free to play.
🎮-Controls-🎮

Clicking on the buttons adds and subtracts followers, which are integrated into the game.

You can also add with the keys:

D / Space /  right arrow  / enter. 

And subtract with:

 A /  left arrow / backspace.

 and the mouse to move around the menus.

"Don't forget to leave a comment"😉
